errm. i have one or another dire question to [@Frybert](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/97766-frybert/), there is a thing that bugs me since a long time...  

Each time when i spot your appearance in a random thread, wiping posts and guiding us forummembers back to order and shape...-  

i get the chills. And i find myself staring for a while at your Nixon avatar until my chickenskin on my neck disappears...  

Commonly the next posts in your newly purged threads take a significant time to emerge, if any at all.  

I feel the moment has come to face my fears and ask you directly:  

1. Are you evil?  

2. Do you like cake?
